title: Careers in design
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: A program which provides an introduction to the design process and how is applied. Aspects mentioned are: function, aesthetics, manufacturing and marketing. Examples of environmental, product and graphics design are illustrated.
